title: Mecha Kingdoms Leona Skin bugged?
body:
hey, i unlocked the skin with mecha kingdom tokens but i cant play it, any ideas whats the problem? it shows up in my collection under "chromas" but not in the skins category, i also have chroma moo cow ali and he shows up in both :/

thx for help

replies.body: You have to buy the skin to use the chroma.
